mapper.insert: INSERT INTO community (commu_id, top_commu_id, user_no, commu_content, cate_id) VALUES (#{commu_id}, #{top_commu_id}, #{user_no}, #{commu_content}, #{cate_id})
mapper.update: UPDATE community SET commu_content = #{commu_content} WHERE commu_id = #{commu_id}
mapper.select: SELECT c.commu_id, c.top_commu_id, c.user_no, u.user_nickname, c.commu_content, c.create_time, c.cate_id FROM community c INNER JOIN user u ON c.user_no = u.user_no
